title: Ottoman and Chinese use of bureaucracy

content.question: Between 1450 and 1750, empires such as the Ottoman and Chinese shared which of the following?

choices.label: Dependence on trade as the main basis for the economy
An elite fighting force made up primarily of slaves
The use of a large bureaucracy to support the government
Continual military campaigns against European armies

content.answer: The use of a large bureaucracy to support the government

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
